comments:
1. Generate a new message instance based on uk.gov.cfh.h3et.mim.6.1.02/Mif/COCD_TP146003UK03-AlcolholIntake.mif
2. Switch to source view and double click AlcoholIntake/author/functionCode's code attribute ("OA")
3. Invoke content assist
